fpmi.business.repository

Interface LibraryRepository

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LibraryRepositoryLocal, LibraryRepositoryRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EjbLibraryRepository, JpaLibraryRepository, LibraryRepositoryImpl

    public interface LibraryRepository
    Base interface with all needed operations in it.
    Business level of application.

    Many methods throws RepositoryException when smth goes wrong in database or problems with user input data detected

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        To start using this interface call this method

      • end

        void end()
        When all operations with this object done, call this method to destroy (close) some dependencies like closing EntityManager

      • createNewUser

        void createNewUser(java.lang.String userName,
                   java.lang.String password)
            throws RepositoryException
        Create new user with role Role.USUAL
        Parameters:
        userName - user name
        password - user password
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if something goes wrong, like empty userName or password, or problems with storing user in database

      • loginUser

        boolean loginUser(java.lang.String userName,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws RepositoryException
        System is trying to login user with Role.USUAL
        Parameters:
        userName - user name
        password - user password
        Returns:
        true - if success login (user with this name and password already exists), false - otherwise
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if something goes wrong in database

      • loginUser

        boolean loginUser(java.lang.String userName,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  Role role)
           throws RepositoryException
        System is trying to login user
        Parameters:
        userName - user name
        password - user password
        role - user role
        Returns:
        true - if success login (user with this name, password and role already exists), false - otherwise
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if something goes wrong in database

      • getUserId

        int getUserId(java.lang.String login)
        Find user by login and returns id
        Parameters:
        login - user login
        Returns:
        id of user

      • deptUsers

        java.util.List<User> deptUsers(int days)
                        throws RepositoryException
        Calculate all users with dept in get back books
        Parameters:
        days - period of dept
        Returns:
        list of dept users
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if something goes wrong in database

      • giveBookToUser

        @Deprecated
void giveBookToUser(Book book,
                                User user,
                                Librarian librarian)
                         throws RepositoryException
        Deprecated. 
        This method is deprecated, user giveBookToUser(Book, User, User) or giveBookToUser(int, int, int) instead of this
        Parameters:
        book - book
        user - user
        librarian - librarian
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • giveBookToUser

        void giveBookToUser(Book book,
                    User user,
                    User librarian)
             throws RepositoryException
        Gives specified book to user
        Parameters:
        book - book
        user - user with role Role.USUAL
        librarian - user with role Role.ADMIN
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

        Parameters:
        bookId - book id
        userId - user id with role Role.USUAL
        libId - user id with role Role.ADMIN
        Throws:
        RepositoryException
